name: Styrene/butadiene/acrylonitrile (SBA) copolymers
FoodContactSubstance: Styrene/butadiene/acrylonitrile (SBA) copolymers (CAS Reg. No., exclusive of minor monomers: 9003-56-9) containing no more than 30 weight percent acrylonitrile and no more than 10 weight percent of total polymer units from one or more of the following monomers: acrylic acid and itaconic acid.
